119.text:

ongoing topic of debate. You only have to

124.text:

and other exhibitions of contemporary art,

129.text:

about what they think a work of art should

134.text:

is it a water colour, or oil painting? Is

146.text:

153.text:

also questions to do with the way in which,

158.text:

such as the Nigerian benin bronze that we

165.text:

of art too. Now, Art History is a discipline.

197.text:

203.text:

208.text:

how are past ideas about art and art history

214.text:

studying the History of Art is about learning

220.text:

visual images to a society. What makes people

227.text:

233.text:

collecting, and other things like the impact

238.text:
